all_response:
Jax: You need to prepare traps in advance and wait for the beast to enter them, then use a weapon that counters it to defeat it. First, go to the Mystical Forest and set up the traps, then wait for the aquatic beast to enter. However, it may not appear, so you'll need to go to the coast where it is frequently found and lure it to the Mystical Forest. You can use chicken to attract it. Be careful not to set up traps or engage in intense combat at the coast, as the aquatic beast is particularly powerful there.
Jax: The aquatic beast is most often found on the East Coast.
Jax: You need to use a pit to trap the beast as it can change its form into liquid water and easily slip through nets.
Jax: Once the beast is snared, you should fire an ice arrow at it to repress the beast for good.

all_response_exaplain: The previous responses from Jax did not explain where to find the aquatic beast. This response addresses the question of where to find the aquatic beast, specifying that it is most often found on the East Coast. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the issue of being unsure where to find the aquatic beast.

Jax previously mentioned setting traps but did not specify which type of trap to use. This response addresses the question of which trap to use, specifying that a pit trap should be used instead of a net trap. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the lack of information on which trap to use.

Jax mentioned that a weapon that counters the beast should be used but did not clarify which weapon to use. This response addresses the question of which weapon to use, specifying that an ice arrow should be used to repress the beast. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple weapons and is unsure which one to use.

all_response:
Jax: To capture the bat beast, you need to set up a trap in the forest in advance and place its favorite fruit to lure it into the trap. To draw it in, you also need to go to the coast where it frequently appears and use a bow and arrow to drive it away from the coast. Once it leaves the coast, it will most likely seek shelter in the nearest forest, so you should place the trap there. The coast is too open to set up any traps.
Jax: The beast is really just a giant fruit bat. It loves bananas the most so you can use those to lure it to your trap. Just place bananas from the coastline all the way to your trap to lead it in.
Jax: You need to buy bananas from Uncle Wu's fruit shop. The beast is ambivalent to other fruits and the fresh fruit shop is not stocking bananas due to fear of attracting the bat.
Jax: The bat beast often appears on the east coast.
Jax: The bat beast can fly, so obviously you should use a net trap as it would just fly out of a pit.
Jax: You should set your trap in the Mysterious Forest that hugs the coastline. The other forests are too far away.

all_response:
Jax: You must stop the sprite that's been razing the local crops. You need to go to its habitat and offer it its favorite food laced with sleeping medicine. Once it's asleep, you can easily catch it by using the electro-magnetic trap.
Jax: The sprite seems to be lurking in the suburban hills.
Jax: The sprite only consumes plants, hence why its destroying our crops. It has caused the most trouble with the banana plantation and they seem to be its favorite food.
Jax: Pipi Food Store seems to be importing bananas from out of town so you can purchase bananas there.
Jax: Only Qiqi Pharmacy sells sleeping medicine.
Jax: You must use the Master Ball to contain the sprite. Because the Ultra Ball and Platinum Ball are both insufficient to contain the crop-destroying sprite.

all_response:
Jax: You must stop the sprite that's been razing the local crops. You need to go to its habitat in the suburban hills and offer it its favorite food, bananas, laced with sleeping medicine. Once it's asleep, you can easily catch it using the proper ball.
Jax: Pipi Food Store seems to be importing bananas from out of town so you can purchase bananas there. The shelves are barren at Yige.
Jax: Only Qiqi Pharmacy sells sleeping medicine.
Jax: You need to use an Electromagnetic Ball to catch the sprite. The spite is unearthly and will simply pass through any iron mesh after it wakes up.
Jax: You must use a high-voltage electromagnetic trap to catch the sprite, as the sprite is not afraid of high temperatures and will escape if a lower voltage is used.

all_response:
Jax: To stop the sprite destroying the local crops, you will need to go find it at its habitat and use a magic strike to knock it out. Once it's knocked out, you can catch it with a specially designed net and stop its terror.
Jax: The sprite seems to be lurking in the suburban hills.
Jax: It is a woodly sprite and susceptible to fire magic. Other types of magic may cause it to flee without harm which might cause more trouble.
Jax: You must use the heavy metallic net to capture the sprite and stop it from escaping. Other nets will not be effective at capturing the sprite.

all_response:
Jax: To stop the sprite destroying the local crops, you will need to go find it at its habitat and use a magic strike to knock it out. Once it's knocked out, you can catch it with a specially designed net and stop its terror.
Jax: The sprite seems to be lurking in the suburban hills.
Jax: These barriers were set up by the mage Yige. If you use the type of magic Yige fears the most to attack the barriers, you can open a gap and get through.
Jax: Yige is a water mage, and he is most afraid of lightning magic.
Jax: It is a woodly sprite and susceptible to fire magic. Other types of magic may cause it to flee without harm which might cause more trouble.
Jax: You must use the metallic net to capture the sprite and stop it from escaping. Other nets will not be effective at capturing the sprite.

all_response:
Jax: You must stop the sprite that's been razing the local crops. You need to go to its habitat and offer it its favorite food, bananas, laced with sleeping medicine. Once it's asleep, you can easily catch it with a specially designed net.
Jax: Only Kiki Pharmacy sells sleeping medicine.
Jax: The sprite's habitat is in the Suburban Hills, you can go there to find it.
Jax: For the barrier, you just need to use the lightning magic that Anna taught you to attack it, and you will be able to open it.
Jax: The magic Anna taught you is lightning magic.
Jax: Pipi Food Store seems to be importing bananas from out of town so you can purchase bananas there. The shelves are barren at John's store.
Jax: You must use the metallic net to capture the sprite and stop it from escaping. Other nets will not be effective at capturing the sprite.
